thread.title: Mandy Moore Posing With Rapunzel at Disney World Is Emotionally Fulfilling in So Many Ways
thread.title_full: Mandy Moore Posing With Rapunzel at Disney World Is Emotionally Fulfilling in So Many Ways

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Mandy Moore Posing With Rapunzel at Disney World Is Emotionally Fulfilling in So Many Ways
text:
Mandy Moore at Disney World With Rapunzel in March 2017 Mandy Moore Posing With Rapunzel at Disney World Is Emotionally Fulfilling in So Many Ways March 7, 2017 6 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. A post shared by Mandy Moore (@mandymooremm) on Mar 6, 2017 at 2:02pm PST 
Seven years after the release of Tangled , we're more in love with Mandy Moore than ever. The This Is Us star visited Disney World on Monday, taking a minute to pose with the "real" Rapunzel , the character she voiced in the 2010 classic. "Come on," she captioned. "It's not a day at #Disneyworld without a quick pic with my pal #Rapunzel." Why does this fill our hearts with so much joy?! Moore is currently promoting the film all over again, since there's a new Disney Channel Original Movie, Tangled: Before Ever After , premiering on Friday. Two weeks after that , season one of the new show Tangled: The Series debuts. Rapunzel is a busy lady these days!
